name: Hell's Arena
description:
Hell's arena is a 2D survival game, with the only objective being to survive for as long as possible whilst being swarmed by increasing numbers of enemies, each possessing their own traits and abilities. Earn points by surviving and killing enemies, and use these points gathered each run to buy new cosmetics in the shop.

All music created by Jackmanrooney: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCglxux0X3igoWwKSLw-ry-w

Main menu song hypnotise : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wIyHdAfXHso&t=1s

shop/guide song cityscape: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVHZ8l6C4Oo&t=61s
